meanings.definition: Making a showy or extravagant display
meanings.sent1: The peacock's feathers were splashier than any other bird's.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was splashier than anyone else's at the party.
meanings.sent3: The clown's outfit was so splashy that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display was splashier than a rainbow after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the city at night were even splashier than the daytime skyline.

meanings.definition: More showy or extravagant than something else
meanings.sent1: The new car was splashier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: His proposal was splashier than all the others.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so splashy with decorations that it stole the show.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was splashier than a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The mansion on the hill was even splashier than the castle in the valley.
